channel.title: Auto-Fishing.. Need some help!

item.title: Auto-Fishing.. Need some help!
item.dc:creator: @Encouragin Encouragin
item.description:
@Encouragin wrote:

We use process for auto fishing. You can use long, int, short variables for auto fishing as you want. Here’s example for auto fishing:

if (fishDelay == 0 && isFishing) {
            callFishMethod();
}

All you have to do is to create the ‘isFishing’ variable and the ‘fishDelay’. and the method which it calls every time it reaches 0. dont forget to change the value of the variables. else it will do it constantly. and you dont incredible lag dont you?

Read full topic

item.title: Auto-Fishing.. Need some help!
item.dc:creator: @firez firez
item.description:
@firez wrote:

I need some help on how i can make my fishing automaticilly fish instead of you have to click. I mean like if you click the fishing spot, it only fishes once but if you want more, you have to keep clicking.

Heres my code:

if (NPCID == 235 && playerLevel[10] >= 1) { if ((IsItemInBag(303) == true) && (actionTimer == 0)) { startAnimation(622); addItem(317, 1); addSkillXP(20 * playerLevel[10], 10); sendMessage("You fish a shrimp"); actionTimer = 5; }

If anyone can help me, it would mean alot to me! :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2008, 01:05:21 PM[/size][hr]Someone help , i raelly need help!

Read full topic
